chapters.title: Into the heart of the mystery

tracks.title: Into the heart of the mystery

chapters.title: A neat mystery - and a neat ending!

tracks.title: A neat mystery - and a neat ending!

metadata.description: Fatty, Larry, Diasy, Pip and Bets are forbidden to solve any mysteries this summer. Then they meet Ern, Mr Goon's nephew, and can't help giving him a few false clues. But they don't expect their fake mystery to turn into a real one, or for Ern to go missing! In the original 1948 text, Fatty's nickname is based on the fact that his initials are F.A.T. as well as his size. All references to his size have been removed from this recording (based on the text from 2016) so that Fatty's nickname refers to his initials only.
metadata.author: Enid Blyton

card.title: The Mystery of the Hidden House
